title: AI-Based Mathematics Education Design and Management Expert Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement for corporate elementary math education managers in integrating AI technology into instructional design and management

learning_goals: Develop the ability to design personalized math education content tailored to learners' proficiency levels using AI analysis tools.
Strengthen the competency to diagnose learners and provide feedback by operating an AI-based formative assessment system.

Learners analyze data from three or more corporate training programs using educational data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI), write effectiveness reports based on five learning impact metrics (completion rates, assessment scores, feedback satisfaction), and propose two or more improvement strategies.

resources: AI Tool Demo Package for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
